    • Method Detail

      • getAllDevices

        public java.util.Set<AbstractDevice> getAllDevices()
        This method returns the list of currently detected devices
        Returns:
        List of AbstractDevice objects containing devices that were detected (can be connected or not)

      • setConnectedDevice

        public void setConnectedDevice(AbstractDevice toConnect)
        Call this method to select the device that should be connected. Can only be called if there is not already a device connected. Right now only one device can be connected at a time.
        Parameters:
        toConnect - AbstractDevice returned by getAllDevices() to which we want to connect

      • disconnectDevice

        public void disconnectDevice(AbstractDevice toDisconnect)
        Call this method to disconnect from the device.
        Parameters:
        toDisconnect - AbstractDevice returned by getAllDevices() from which we want to disconnect

      • getConnectedDevice

        public AbstractDevice getConnectedDevice()
        This method returns the currently connected device.
        Returns:
        AbstractDevice object of the currently connected device or null if no device is connected or the connection was dropped.
